schema.description: Roaring Apps company overview in a lookup. list contains all possible fields returned by either of the api verb calls

changeDate.description: Date for when the record was last changed

companyId.description: Company identifier (company registration number / organization number)

employerContributionReg.description: Company is registererd for employer contribution tax (Arb.avg Sweden)

preliminaryTaxReg.description: Company is approved for preliminary tax (F-skatt Sweden)

severalCompanyName.description: Indicates if the company have more than one active name

vatReg.description: Company is registered for VAT (MOMS Sweden)

vepChangedDate.description: Show the latest date any of preliminaryTaxReg, employerContributionReg or vatReg has had a change

visitAddress.description: Visiting address, street name, street number and unit
